content: the deirdra fingerless crochet mitts are a beautifully textured and practical accessory featuring a stunning short row cable stitch designed in both child and adult sizes and offered in two different lengths these mitts are as versatile as they are stylish the clever shaping and textured design give a knit-look finish while still being accessible to crocheters who enjoy working in row with simple techniques this is a crochet pattern for the deidra mitts part of the deidra collection a quick and easy crochet pattern that is great for gifts for the whole family the fingerless gloves are crocheted using us yo slip_stitch and half_double_crochet stitches with a delicate and lightweight feel *please note*-- this listing is for a pdf pattern written in english not a finished product pattern features sizes included child to adult sizes skill level intermediate stitch half_double_crochet and yarn over slip stitches instant pdf download full video tutorial to support written pattern
